General.Name: Jubilee Platinum
General.Description: Jubilee Metals Group plc operates as a diversified metals recovery company. It operates through PGM and Chrome, Copper and Cobalt, and Other segments. The company explores for platinum group metals, such as platinum, palladium, rhodium, ruthenium, iridium, and osmium; and chrome, lead, zinc, vanadium, copper, and cobalt ores. It operates in South Africa, Australia, Mauritius, Zambia, and the United Kingdom. The company was formerly known as Jubilee Platinum Plc and changed its name to Jubilee Metals Group PLC in December 2017. Jubilee Metals Group PLC was incorporated in 2002 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 7/8 Kendrick Mews, London, United Kingdom, SW7 3HG
